trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around May 6th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsit was about half 4pm i was sitting in my garden looking at the sky when something caught my eye it was cloaked but i could see the outline of the object as it passed infront of clouds with the effect just like on a hot day and u can see heat comming off a road and the horizon it passed at a steady speed and a straight line i followed it with my eyes and then as it got further away it dissapeared in the distance, it didnt have a shape that i could describe my brother also see it as i pointed it out so two of us couldnt be wrong it also made no sound and was about 300ft high,
